name: n8n-nodes-base.airtopTool
semantic_context: Scrape and control any site with Airtop

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Scrape and control any site with Airtop
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Click an Element
options.description: Execute a click on an element given a description

options.name: Fill Form
options.description: Fill a form with the provided information

options.name: Hover on an Element
options.description: Execute a hover action on an element given a description

options.name: Scroll
options.description: Execute a scroll action on the page

options.name: Type
options.description: Execute a Type action on an element given a description

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

webhookUrl.name: webhookUrl
webhookUrl.description: Webhook URL to invoke the Airtop agent. Visit Airtop Agents for more information.
webhookUrl.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

agentParameters.name: agentParameters
agentParameters.description: Agent's input parameters in JSON format. Visit Airtop Agents for more information.
agentParameters.ai_hint: Agent's input parameters in JSON format. Visit Airtop Agents for more information.

awaitExecution.name: awaitExecution
awaitExecution.description: Whether to wait for the agent to complete its execution

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Timeout in seconds to wait for the agent to finish
timeout.ai_hint: Timeout in seconds to wait for the agent to finish

profileName.name: profileName
profileName.description: The name of the Airtop profile to load or create
profileName.ai_hint: The name of the Airtop profile to load or create

saveProfileOnTermination.name: saveProfileOnTermination
saveProfileOnTermination.description: Whether to automatically save the Airtop profile for this session upon termination

record.name: record
record.description: Whether to record the browser session. More details.

timeoutMinutes.name: timeoutMinutes
timeoutMinutes.description: Minutes to wait before the session is terminated due to inactivity
timeoutMinutes.ai_hint: Minutes to wait before the session is terminated due to inactivity

proxy.name: proxy
proxy.description: Choose how to configure the proxy for this session

options.name: None
options.description: No proxy will be used

options.name: Integrated
options.description: Use Airtop-provided proxy

options.name: Proxy URL
options.description: Use a proxy URL to configure the proxy

proxy.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

proxyConfig.name: proxyConfig
proxyConfig.description: The Airtop-provided configuration to use for the proxy

options.name: country
options.description: The country to use for the proxy. Not all countries are guaranteed to provide a proxy. Learn more here.

options.name: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan Da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
sticky
options.description: Whether to try to maintain the same IP address for the duration of the session. Airtop can guarantee that the same IP address will be available for up to a maximum of 30 minutes.

proxyConfig.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

proxyUrl.name: proxyUrl
proxyUrl.description: The URL of the proxy to use
proxyUrl.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: visualScope
options.description: Defines the strategy for visual analysis of the current window

options.name: Auto
options.description: Provides the simplest out-of-the-box experience for most web pages

options.name: Viewport
options.description: For analysis of the current browser view only

options.name: Page
options.description: For analysis of the entire page

options.name: Scan
options.description: For a full page analysis on sites that have compatibility issues with 'Page' mode

options.name: waitForNavigation
options.description: The condition to wait for the navigation to complete after an interaction (click, type or hover). Defaults to 'Fully Loaded'.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

notice.displayName: Note: This operation is not needed if you enabled 'Save Profile' in the 'Create Session' operation
notice.name: notice
notice.default: This operation will save the profile on session termination

sessionId.name: sessionId
sessionId.description: The ID of the Session to use
sessionId.ai_hint: The ID of the Session to use

windowId.name: windowId
windowId.description: The ID of the Window to use
windowId.ai_hint: The ID of the Window to use

url.name: url
url.description: URL to load in the window
url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

getLiveView.name: getLiveView
getLiveView.description: Whether to get the URL of the window's Live View

includeNavigationBar.name: includeNavigationBar
includeNavigationBar.description: Whether to include the navigation bar in the Live View. When enabled, the navigation bar will be visible allowing you to navigate between pages.

screenResolution.name: screenResolution
screenResolution.description: The screen resolution of the Live View. Setting a resolution will force the window to open at that specific size.
screenResolution.ai_hint: The screen resolution of the Live View. Setting a resolution will force the window to open at that specific size.

disableResize.name: disableResize
disableResize.description: Whether to disable the window from being resized in the Live View

outputImageAsBinary.description: Whether to output the image as a binary file instead of a base64 encoded string
outputImageAsBinary.name: outputImageAsBinary

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: ID of the file to load into the session
fileId.ai_hint: ID of the file to load into the session

outputBinaryFile.name: outputBinaryFile
outputBinaryFile.description: Whether to output the file in binary format if the file is ready for download

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

sessionIds.name: sessionIds
sessionIds.description: Comma-separated list of Session IDs to filter files by. When empty, all files from all sessions will be returned.
sessionIds.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of Session IDs to filter files by. When empty, all files from all sessions will be returned.

outputSingleItem.name: outputSingleItem
outputSingleItem.description: Whether to output one item containing all files or output each file as a separate item

elementDescription.name: elementDescription
elementDescription.description: A specific description of the element to execute the interaction on
elementDescription.placeholder: e.g. the search box at the top of the page
elementDescription.ai_hint: A specific description of the element to execute the interaction on

includeHiddenElements.name: includeHiddenElements
includeHiddenElements.description: Whether to include hidden elements in the interaction

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Name for the file to upload. For a session, all files loaded should have unique names.
fileName.ai_hint: Name for the file to upload. For a session, all files loaded should have unique names.

fileType.name: fileType
fileType.description: Choose the type of file to upload. Defaults to 'Customer Upload'.
fileType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

source.name: source
source.description: Source of the file to upload
source.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property containing the file data
binaryPropertyName.ai_hint: Name of the binary property containing the file data

triggerFileInputParameter.name: triggerFileInputParameter
triggerFileInputParameter.description: Whether to automatically trigger the file input dialog in the current window. If disabled, the file will only be uploaded to the session without opening the file input dialog.

sessionMode.name: sessionMode
sessionMode.description: Choose between creating a new session or using an existing one

options.name: Automatically Create Session
options.description: Automatically create a new session and window for this operation

options.name: Use Existing Session
options.description: Use an existing session and window for this operation

sessionMode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

autoTerminateSession.name: autoTerminateSession
autoTerminateSession.description: Whether to terminate the session after the operation is complete. When disabled, you must manually terminate the session. By default, idle sessions timeout after 10 minutes

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.placeholder: e.g. Is there a login form in this page?
prompt.description: The prompt to query the page content
prompt.ai_hint: The prompt to query the page content

clickType.name: clickType
clickType.description: The type of click to perform. Defaults to left click.
clickType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

formData.name: formData
formData.description: The information to fill into the form written in natural language
formData.ai_hint: The information to fill into the form written in natural language

scrollingMode.name: scrollingMode

options.name: Automatic
options.description: Describe with natural language the element to scroll to

options.name: Manual
options.description: Define the direction and amount to scroll by

scrollingMode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

scrollToElement.description: A natural language description of the element to scroll to
scrollToElement.name: scrollToElement
scrollToElement.placeholder: e.g. the page section titled "Contact Us"
scrollToElement.ai_hint: A natural language description of the element to scroll to

scrollToEdge.name: scrollToEdge
scrollToEdge.description: The direction to scroll to. When 'Scroll By' is defined, 'Scroll To Edge' action will be executed first, then 'Scroll By' action.
scrollToEdge.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

scrollBy.name: scrollBy
scrollBy.description: The amount to scroll by. When 'Scroll To Edge' is defined, 'Scroll By' action will be executed after 'Scroll To Edge'.

options.name: scrollValues
options.description: The amount in pixels or percentage to scroll by

scrollBy.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

scrollWithin.name: scrollWithin
scrollWithin.description: Scroll within an element on the page
scrollWithin.ai_hint: Scroll within an element on the page

text.name: text
text.description: The text to type into the browser window
text.ai_hint: The text to type into the browser window

pressEnterKey.name: pressEnterKey
pressEnterKey.description: Whether to press the Enter key after typing the text

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'run' THEN SHOW parameter 'webhookUrl'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'run' THEN SHOW parameter 'agentParameters'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'run' THEN SHOW parameter 'awaitExecution'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'run' AND awaitExecution == True THEN SHOW parameter 'timeout'
IF resource == 'session' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'profileName'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'saveProfileOnTermination'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'record'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'timeoutMinutes'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'proxy'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'create' AND proxy == 'integrated' THEN SHOW parameter 'proxyConfig'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'create' AND proxy == 'proxyUrl' THEN SHOW parameter 'proxyUrl'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'save' THEN SHOW parameter 'notice'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'save' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionId'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'save' THEN SHOW parameter 'profileName'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'terminate' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionId'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'waitForDownload' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionId'
IF resource == 'session' AND operation == 'waitForDownload' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'window' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'window' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionId'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation IN ["close", "takeScreenshot", "load", "getLiveView"] THEN SHOW parameter 'windowId'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'getLiveView'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'create' AND getLiveView == True THEN SHOW parameter 'includeNavigationBar'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'create' AND getLiveView == True THEN SHOW parameter 'screenResolution'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'create' AND getLiveView == True THEN SHOW parameter 'disableResize'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'getLiveView' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'load' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'load' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'window' AND operation == 'takeScreenshot' THEN SHOW parameter 'outputImageAsBinary'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'deleteFile' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'outputBinaryFile'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'getMany' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'getMany' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'getMany' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionIds'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'getMany' THEN SHOW parameter 'outputSingleItem'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'load' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'load' THEN SHOW parameter 'windowId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'load' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'load' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementDescription'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'load' THEN SHOW parameter 'includeHiddenElements'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'windowId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileName'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileType'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'source'
IF source == 'binary' AND resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF source == 'url' AND resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'triggerFileInputParameter'
IF triggerFileInputParameter == True AND resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementDescription'
IF triggerFileInputParameter == True AND resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'includeHiddenElements'
IF resource == 'extraction' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND operation IN ["getPaginated", "query", "scrape"] THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionMode'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND sessionMode == 'existing' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionId'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND sessionMode == 'existing' THEN SHOW parameter 'windowId'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND sessionMode == 'new' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND sessionMode == 'new' THEN SHOW parameter 'profileName'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND sessionMode == 'new' THEN SHOW parameter 'autoTerminateSession'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND operation == 'getPaginated' THEN SHOW parameter 'prompt'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND operation == 'getPaginated' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND operation == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'prompt'
IF resource == 'extraction' AND operation == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'interaction' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'interaction' THEN SHOW parameter 'sessionId'
IF resource == 'interaction' THEN SHOW parameter 'windowId'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'click' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementDescription'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'click' THEN SHOW parameter 'clickType'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'fill' THEN SHOW parameter 'formData'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'hover' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementDescription'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'scroll' THEN SHOW parameter 'scrollingMode'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'scroll' AND scrollingMode == 'automatic' THEN SHOW parameter 'scrollToElement'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'scroll' AND scrollingMode == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'scrollToEdge'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'scroll' AND scrollingMode == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'scrollBy'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'scroll' THEN SHOW parameter 'scrollWithin'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'type' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'type' THEN SHOW parameter 'pressEnterKey'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation == 'type' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementDescription'
IF resource == 'interaction' AND operation IN ["click", "hover", "type", "scroll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
